metadata.title: CVE-2021-22945 curl: use-after-free and double-free in MQTT sending (moderate)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in libcurl. When sending data to an MQTT server could in some situations lead to libcurl using already freed memory and then try to free it again. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality as well as system availability. 
            STATEMENT: The MQTT feature is not enabled by default in any of the curl version that Red Hat ships

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
rh-dotnet21-curl is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
